unnormalised: India clinched a nail-biting victory against Australia in the recent T20 match! The final score was India 182/4 and Australia 180/6. What a game, huh?
normalised: India clinched a nail biting victory against Australia in the recent T two zero match! The final score was India one hundred and eighty two divided by four and Australia one hundred and eighty divided by six. What a game, huh?

unnormalised: Virat Kohli smashed a brilliant 75 runs off just 50 balls. His strike rate was a whopping 150! Hardik Pandya finished the game with a six, scoring 25* (that star means not out, you know) off 15 deliveries.
normalised: Virat Kohli smashed a brilliant seventy five runs off just fifty balls. His strike rate was a whopping one hundred and fifty! Hardik Pandya finished the game with a six, scoring twenty five not out off fifteen deliveries.

unnormalised: Earlier, Australian opener David Warner scored 60 runs, but the rest of the batting lineup couldnâ€™t quite keep up. Their run rate in the last 5 overs dipped below 8.0.
normalised: Earlier, Australian opener David Warner scored sixty runs, but the rest of the batting lineup couldn't quite keep up. Their run rate in the last five overs dipped below eight point zero.

unnormalised: The man of the match award rightfully went to Kohli for his outstanding performance. Experts are already saying he's on track to break more records this season. Stats-wise, this game was a thriller!
normalised: The man of the match award rightfully went to Kohli for his outstanding performance. Experts are already saying he's on track to break more records this season. Stats wise, this game was a thriller!

unnormalised: Next up, India faces Pakistan on 20/10/2024. Can't wait to see if they keep up this winning streak! All eyes on the stadium; will be a massive showdown to watch.
